traits.name: Can't Catch Me
entries: The gingerbrute has advantage on any ability checks or saving throws it makes to avoid or end the {@condition grappled} or the {@condition restrained} condition on itself.

traits.name: Sweet Victory
entries: Once the gingerbrute is destroyed, a creature can use its action to eat all the remains and gain 5 temporary hit points. The remains crumble away after 24 hours if not eaten.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The gingerbrute makes two Fork attacks, two Gumdrop Slingshot attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Fork
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gumdrop Slingshot
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.
